files.patch:
@@ -66,6 +66,11 @@ reload:
 
 // Waiting for the search results to appear...
 wait-for: "#titles"
+assert-css: (
+    "#titles > button > div.count",
+    {"color": "rgb(136, 136, 136)"},
+    ALL,
+)
 assert-css: (
     "//*[@class='desc'][text()='Just a normal struct.']",
     {"color": "rgb(197, 197, 197)"},
